message.body: Hey so what happened with the money u owe me? Did u send me something since I could set up pop money?

Sorry to keep bothering u I just wanted to get some snow boots before it gets cold since all my leather boots leak and it would really be helpful to have something new... And since I'm not working yet I really don't have many resources
Yeah sorry :-( im getting home sunday and will send u a check plus interest for the hassle
I just need an apology for the hassle it interest
Ok but accept some interest too. Your feet might benefit
